si.title: මරණ
body_lines: තුනක පිටුපස අසුනේ සිටි ගැහැණු ළමයෙක් පිටුපස අසුනකදී මිය ගියේය.
ත්රිවිධ හමුදාවේ ත්රිරෝද රථයේ රියදුරු බරපතල තුවාල සහිතව රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර තිබේ.
මියගිය කුඩා දැරිය තම ආච්චි, මව සහ පියා සමඟ නෙගම්බෝ වෙත ගොස්, නෙගම්බෝහි මව බෑම සඳහා රැකියාවට ගොස් ඇගේ ආච්චි සමඟ වාඩි වී නිවසට පැමිණියාය.
මේ අවස්ථාවේ දී, දැරිය පිටුපස සිටි දැරිය, පියාගේ බෙල්ල කඩලා ප්රදේශයට බැඳ තිබේ.. පොලිසිය විසින් කරන ලද මූලික විමසීම්වලින් හෙළි වූයේ දැරිය එළියට ඇද දැමූ බවයි.
දැරිය නෙගම්බෝ රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කිරීමෙන් පසු මියගොස් ඇති අතර වැඩිදුර ප්රතිකාර සඳහා පියා කොළඹ ජාතික රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර තිබේ.
සිද්ධිය සම්බන්ධයෙන් දිවුලපිටිය පොලිසිය වැඩිදුර පරීක්ෂණ පවත්වයි.

en.title: Death
body_lines: A girl who was in the back seat of a three -wheeler was killed in a back seat.
The driver of the three -wheeler, the girl's father has been admitted to the hospital with serious injuries.
The deceased little girl went to Negombo with her grandmother, mother and father, unloaded her mother in Negombo to go to work, and sat down with her grandmother and came home.
In this case, the girl who was behind the girl, the father's neck was tied to the Kadala area.. Preliminary inquiries by the police revealed that the girl was thrown out.
The girl has died after being admitted to the Negombo Hospital and the father has been admitted to the Colombo National Hospital for further treatment.
Divulapitiya police are conducting further investigations into the incident.

summary_lines: A tragic accident occurred when a young girl riding in the back seat of a three-wheeler was fatally injured. The driver, her father, suffered serious injuries and was hospitalized. The girl had accompanied her family to Negombo, where she was left with her grandmother while her mother worked. The incident took place near the Kadala area, and preliminary police reports suggest the girl was ejected from the vehicle. She later succumbed to her injuries at Negombo Hospital, and her father was taken to Colombo National Hospital for treatment. Further investigations are ongoing by the Divulapitiya police.
